name: Secret Lab Escape
description:
Made for BYOG 2021.

Themes used include : Minimal Interaction and Two views.

Controls :

  • Space to move in the direction of the arrow.
  • Enter/Return to turn on goggles.

Help Charles escape a secret facility by helping help move through lab obstacles.

Lab is full of Trash Cans, Lasers and Moving Robots, so take care of those while you move.

Charles has a pair of UV goggles that can help him see through darkness. Use those goggles to determine the position of trash cans as colliding with them makes a lot of noise which is not good, is it?

Lasers glow in dark so they can be seen without the goggles but they are not visible while the goggles are on as UV rays pass through the lasers.

The game is short and simple, the main thing is the idea. So give me your opinions on that.
